ingredients: 1 large carrot, peeled and chopped (about 1 cup)
Optional: 1 cup fresh spinach or kale
steps: Heat olive oil in large pot over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, 5-7 minutes
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add zucchini, carrot, cauliflower, and bell pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables begin to soften, 8-10 minutes
Add crushed tomatoes, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine
Add broth and bring to boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 20-25 minutes until all vegetables are very tender
If using spinach or kale, add during last 5 minutes of cooking
Remove from heat and let cool slightly, about 5 minutes
Using immersion blender, blend sauce until completely smooth. Or transfer in batches to regular blender and blend until smooth
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Add pinch of sugar if sauce is too acidic
Serve over pasta with parmesan cheese if desired
title: Hidden Veggie Pasta Sauce
